title: If you had Superman's powers, how would you use them? - Quora

response.answer_text: If I were Superman… The only way to stay moral would be to offer my services to the good of all mankind. But I’d probably keep my powers hidden at first, and practice with them, and, make myself obscenely rich in secret first to protect my loved ones. This should be ludicrously easy for me with Superman’s powers and I wouldn’t have to steal a thing. I could go into space and find some valuable minerals, gemstones, gold, or whatever, or, conversely, do some routine, but valuable work in nano-seconds- but a lot of it, and make myself a billionaire. Probably some combo. I am a billionaire in secret and protect my family before I do anything else. During this time I start to consult with the world’s greatest’s minds. I consult with them- not about crime (crime will always be here) but space exploration and terraforming. That’s the next step. I don’t do too much at first. Unfortunately, I will eventually outlive my human wife. But since Kryptonian DNA is compatible with human we will have children that are half-human, half Kryptonian with powers that are compatible with mine. This is good. I won’t be alone and immortal. I raise them with principles of non-interference in the human race, but I’m assuming they will make some mistakes (damn kids!) I help out with major disasters from time to time though. I also don’t let them nuke themselves. But that’s about it. Then I (and maybe a couple of the kids) terraform Mars by 2040. By 2050 we are onto the 3rd Generation of Kryptonians. Assuming I haven’t screwed up the kids too bad, I head up a deep space exploration- to look for another suitable planet to terraform and to search for other intelligent life. This will take take me to at least 2100. Since I’m lightspeed capable, I would just need some gear that could hold a solar charge and some basic supplies in case I need a back up. Maybe one of the kids or grand kids goes with me. It’s a long journey. By the time I get back there are now five generations of Kryptonians. I’m assuming there are some problems in the family at this point, and factions brewing. But, since I’m Superman, and have had my powers the longest, I’m still the most powerful… but the humans may be sick of us. It’s time for us to have our own planet. I suggest we terraform our own. But now there is some genetic diversity. Maybe I come back with some friendly aliens. Maybe I find hostile aliens? Maybe I come back with squat. Sounds like one hell of a ride…. where can I touch the platinum kryptonite and sign up!
